mapper.select: SELECT s.memo, s.created_date, m.nickname, p.thumbnail FROM member_scrap AS s, member AS m, post AS p WHERE p.member_num = m.num AND s.post_num = p.post_num ORDER BY created_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_scrap(member_num, post_num, memo, created_date) VALUES(#{member_num}, #{post_num}, #{memo}, now())
